description:
Some instance queries against the db through the conductor can be optimized to return a reduced set of instances as needed for the job at hand. Most of these are part of periodic tasks, so the win is kind of big.

Compute methods where queries can be made more efficient:

_get_instances_on_driver
_poll_rebooting_instances
_poll_rescued_instances
_reclaim_queued_deletes
_run_image_cache_manager_pass
title: Instance queries in compute manager can be optimised
